title: The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky SC (GOG)
description:
Install instructions:
- Run "setup_legend_of_heroes_trails_in_the_sky_sc_2.0.0.1.exe"
- Play
PLEASE REMEMBER TO SEED, MANY OTHERS WANT THIS! :)
If you like this game, support the developers and BUY IT!

Title: LEGEND OF HEROES: TRAILS IN THE SKY SC, THE
Genre: Role-playing - Turn-based - Fantasy
Works on: Windows (XP, Vista, 7, 8, 10)
Languages: Audio and text: English
Modes: Single-player
Released: October 29, 2015
Size: 3.2 GB
Company: Nihon Falcom Corporation / XSEED Games
Store page: http://www.gog.com/game/legend_of_heroes_trails_in_the_sky_sc_the

About:
Picking up shortly after The Legend of Heroes: Trails in the Sky, Estelle travels across Liberl in search of Joshua. The journey involves more than seeking loved ones, however, as the Bracer Guild also tasks her with unraveling the mysteries behind the newly unveiled Society of Ouroboros.
Amazing Original Soundtrack â€” Another highly-acclaimed soundtrack from the renowned music department at development house Falcom, also the creators of the soundtracks for the Ys series, sets the mood for this moving tale.
Dynamic and Unique Strategic Combat System â€” A strategic turn-based combat system yields deep and involving character, weapon and magic-based attacks.
A Huge Adventure Awaits â€” A powerful and emotional tale spanning well over 50 hours of core gameplay, with numerous optional side quests.

Minimum system requirements - Windows: Windows XP / Vista / 7 / 8 / 10
Processor: Pentium III 550 MHz
Memory: 512 MB RAM
Graphics: 32 MB VRAM, 3D accelerator compatible w/ DirectX 9.0c
DirectX: Version 9.0c
Hard Drive: 5 GB available space
Sound Card: Compatible with DirectX 9.0c
Mouse, Keyboard
